snippet.title: As Far As The Eye | RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Build your mobile village, explore hexagonal maps, and travel to the center of the world in this roguelike management game. 
► Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1119700/As_Far_As_The_Eye/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/as_far_as_the_eye
Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/as-far-as-the-eye
